item.title: Codemeta Workshop
item.description: April 15 - 17 2016 Portland, Oregon The Future of Software Metadata Agenda The CodeMeta Project Workshop The CodeMeta project does not seek to create yet another standard. Rather, we’re aiming to create a crosswalk table between standards already in use – think of this as a Rosetta stone of software metadata. Beginning in an Open Science Code-fest discussion lead by Abby Mayes and now thanks to a generous NSF EAGER Grant to Carl Boettiger (UC Berkeley) & Matt Jones (NCEAS & UC Santa Barbara), we will bring together leaders of software and data repositories with academic researchers to develop this crosswalk table for software metadata.
